name: Export Portal Configuration
description: This task will export portal configuration to Azure Repos
author: Arpit
helpMarkDown: This task will export portal configuration from the Microsoft Dataverse Environment

inputs.name: PortalWebsiteid
inputs.label: Website Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value from Dynamics 365

inputs.name: ApplicationId
inputs.label: Application Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value while doing app registration in Azure AD

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value while doing app registration in Azure AD

inputs.name: TenantId
inputs.label: Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value from Azure AD

inputs.name: ExportPortalData
inputs.label: Export Portal Data
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether you want to take portal data export of all Portal Entities or Only Selected Portal Entities. If you choose 'All' then it will take data export from all portal entities. In 'Include', you can specify all entities (in comma seperated format) that you want to include in the data export. In 'Exclude', you can specify all entities that you want to exclude from being exported from Microsoft Dataverse

inputs.name: IncludedEntitiesName
inputs.label: Include Entities (logical name in comma seperated format)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the list of entities (logical name) that you want to include in the data export. For Ex. adx_webpage,adx_contentsnippet,adx_entitylist,adx_entityform

inputs.name: ExcludedEntitiesName
inputs.label: Exclude Entities (logical name in comma seperated format)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the list of entities (logical name) that you want to exclude from the portal export. For Ex. adx_sitesetting,adx_entitypermission,adx_webrole,adx_weblinkset

inputs.name: TargetFolderAll
inputs.label: Target Folder to Export Portal Data
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose repository folder path, where you want to save the exported portal data

OutputVariables.name: ExcludedTables
OutputVariables.description: This sends the excluded table list to the next step of the pipeline.
